headline: North Atlantic France SAS successfully completes the acquisition of a controlling stake in Esso Société Anonyme Française SA and of 100% of ExxonMobil Chemical France SAS, two independent companies of the ExxonMobil group
summary: Paris, FRANCE, Nov. 28, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- North Atlantic France SAS successfully completes the acquisition of a controlling stake in Esso Société Anonyme Française SA and of 100% of ExxonMobil Chemical France SAS, two independent companies of the ExxonMobil group Successful completion of the acquisition by North Atlantic France SAS (“North Atlantic France”) of the 82.89% controlling interest of ExxonMobil France Holding SAS (“ExxonMobil”) in French listed company Esso Société Anonyme Fran

headline: IXC: Understanding The Structure And Suitability Of This Global Energy ETF
summary: iShares Global Energy ETF offers global exposure to major energy producers, but 58.8% of assets are in U.S. companies. Learn more about IXC ETF here.

headline: Japan Won’t Quit Russian Oil and Gas
summary: Japan’s government says Russian oil and LNG remain vital to its energy security despite new U.S. sanctions and political pressure to cut ties.

raw.headline: Japan Won’t Quit Russian Oil and Gas

headline: Oil Dividend Roundup: I Prefer Occidental Petroleum Over Exxon Mobil
summary: OXY and XOM show solid sector positioning, with OXY offering stronger dividend metrics, faster turnover, and clear catalysts. Learn more on XOM and OXY stocks here.
